function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Coupling of environmentally efficient vehicles and technical solutions may lead to increased urban mobility and transportation activities, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases in densely populated areas.","Impact":"Unmitigated spread of contagious diseases leading to public health crises and outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation regulations for public transportation, enforce social distancing measures, and promote the use of personal protective equipment (PPE).","Technologies":"Smart sensors for monitoring crowd density, contactless payment systems, and air filtration systems for public transportation vehicles.","People":"Urban residents, commuters, and individuals using public transportation.","Owner":"Governmental transportation agencies and urban planning authorities."},{"Description":"Ramping up the uptake of low emission vehicles and constructing more electric car charging points may increase human interactions within urban environments, potentially contributing to the transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Elevated risk of disease transmission due to increased human activity around charging points and public transportation facilities.","Mitigation":"Promote contactless charging options, implement regular sanitation of charging points and transportation facilities, and provide public health education on disease prevention.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, self-sanitizing surfaces, and public health monitoring apps.","People":"Vehicle owners, commuters, and individuals utilizing public charging facilities.","Owner":"Local government, transportation authorities, and electric vehicle infrastructure providers."},{"Description":"Facilitating a step change towards sustainable improvements in air quality may lead to increased construction activities, potentially causing airborne particle pollution and respiratory health risks for urban residents.","Impact":"Unmitigated air pollution leading to respiratory health issues and exacerbation of respiratory diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement strict emission control regulations for construction activities, invest in advanced air filtration systems for construction sites, and monitor air quality in urban areas.","Technologies":"Advanced air quality monitoring sensors, emission control technology for construction equipment, and respiratory health tracking apps.","People":"Urban residents, construction workers, and individuals living near construction sites.","Owner":"Governmental environmental agencies, construction companies, and public health organizations."}]}
